meanings.definition: A note placed at the end of a document, chapter, or book that provides additional information or citations.
meanings.sent1: In the book, the endnote explained the historical context of the events.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include an endnote with your sources at the end of the paper.
meanings.sent3: The endnote at the back of the book was like a treasure hunt for curious readers.
meanings.sent4: Her endnote was a beacon of knowledge in the sea of information.
meanings.sent5: The endnote acted as a secret doorway to more details.

meanings.definition: To add a note at the end of a document for reference or clarification.
meanings.sent1: She always endnotes her reports to give credit to her sources.
meanings.sent2: Remember to endnote your findings to make them easier to follow.
meanings.sent3: He endnotes his emails with fun facts to surprise his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The speaker endnoted his speech with a heartfelt message to the audience.
meanings.sent5: Endnoting your work shows attention to detail and professionalism.
